alert.note: Alert for Navajo (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 13 at 1:02PM MST until September 13 at 1:30PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: The National Weather Service in Flagstaff has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Navajo County in north central Arizona... * Until 230 PM MDT. * At 202 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles northwest of Joseph City, or 14 miles east of Winslow, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of Navajo County. This includes Interstate 40 between mile markers 263 and 274. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Large hail and damaging winds and continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
